summary: In the 1810s, an old maid poses as her own niece in order to teach her onetime beau a lesson.
cast: Katharine Hepburn|Franchot Tone|Eric Blore|Fay Bainter|Cora Witherspoon|Estelle Winwood|Sherwood Bailey|William Bakewell|Joan Fontaine|Helena Grant|Bonita Granville|Carmencita Johnson|Payne B. Johnson|Darwood Kaye|Florence Lake|Lydia McKim|Clifford Severn|Yorke Sherwood|Roland Varno
title: Olivia
